title: Gates
description: Iris Sinclair is the last of the Sinclair’s, an ancient family descended from the druids who first opened the Gates to the Other Side back in 10,000 BC. Her entire childhood has been controlled, shielded from the dangers of the Gates, but now, as she turns eighteen and heads off to college in England, a whole new world of freedom awaits…on this side of reality, and beyond.
author: C.J. Inkson
